        Method for setting up the manager.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The DataSource used for database connection.

      • setLogger

        public void setLogger(FileOutputStream fs)
        Method for setting up the manager.
        Parameters:
        fs - The output stream for logger output.

      • createTask

        public Long createTask(Task task,
              String[] cmdArgs)
        Starts a new Task and stores it in the database.
        Parameters:
        task - The Task to be started.
        cmdArgs - The arguments for the Task.
        Returns:
        The ID of the new Task. Null if the Task creation failed.

      • removeTask

        public void removeTask(Task task)
        Removes the Task from the database.
        Parameters:
        task - The Task to be removed.

      • updateTask

        public void updateTask(Task task)
        Updates the given Task.
        Parameters:
        task - The Task to be updated.

      • getTask

        public Task getTask(Long id)
        Retrieves the Task from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the coveted Task.
        Returns:
        The Task with the specified ID. Null id no such Task is found.

      • getTasksRunBy

        public List<Task> getTasksRunBy(User owner)
        Returns all Tasks of the given user.
        Parameters:
        owner - The User whose Tasks are to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        List of Tasks run by the User specified.

      • getActiveTaskCount

        public int getActiveTaskCount(User user)
        Returns the count of all the active tasks of a user.
        Parameters:
        user - The User whose Tasks are to be counted.
        Returns:
        The count of all active Tasks run by the specified user.
